summary: When I first heard that Dawnguard would be adding Sun Damage as a magical effect, my immediate thought was \"Wouldn\'t it be awesome if Dawnbreaker did Sun Damage instead of Fire Damage?\" Well, I got tired of waiting for someone else to feel the same way. Dawnbreaker now deals Sun Damage instead of Fire Damage.
descriptionHtml:
When I first heard that Dawnguard would be adding Sun Damage as a magical effect, my immediate thought was \"Wouldn\'t it be awesome if Dawnbreaker did Sun Damage instead of Fire Damage?\" Well, I got tired of waiting for someone else to feel the same way. Dawnbreaker now deals Sun Damage instead of Fire Damage. The anti-undead explosion effect hasn\'t been touched.

Because Sun Damage is a Dawnguard-added effect, this should require Dawnguard. This conflicts with any other mod that alters Dawnbreaker.

Enjoy.
author: Zaulyl
